name: Click Detector
description: Tracks consecutive taps and exposes click count details.

use: you want click counts without manual timers.

patterns.title: Custom multi-click threshold
patterns.code:
ClickDetector(
  threshold: const Duration(milliseconds: 500),
  onClick: (details) {},
  child: const Text('Slower double-click'),
)

theming: No theme dependencies; style the child directly.
accessibility: Multi-click is pointer-centric; provide alternate actions for keyboard users.
do: Use for double-click behaviors on desktop/web.
Combine with hover/focus feedback for clarity.
dont: Use for critical actions without a single-click fallback.
